price: Y quien haya realizado una mala obra, tan pequeña como un átomo, la encontrará registrada.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
